Class View

java.lang.Object
View
public class View extends Object
The View class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for a Vending Machine application. It provides methods to display various menus and user interactions using Swing components.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    View()
    Constructs a new View object, initializing the main frame of the application.

  • Constructor Details

    • View

      public View()
      Constructs a new View object, initializing the main frame of the application. The frame is set up with a background image, and its default properties are set.

  • Method Details

    • displayMenu

      public int displayMenu()
      Displays the main menu to the user and waits for their choice.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the user's menu choice. 1 - Create a regular vending machine 2 - Create a special vending machine 3 - Test current vending machine 4 - Exit the program

    • displayNoVendingMachine

      public void displayNoVendingMachine()
      Displays a message to inform the user that no vending machine has been created yet.

    • displayTestMenu

      public int displayTestMenu(boolean isSpecialVendingMachine)
      Displays the test menu to the user and waits for their choice.
      Parameters:
      isSpecialVendingMachine - A boolean indicating whether the vending machine is special or regular.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the user's menu choice. 1 - Vending features 2 - Maintenance features 3 - Special features (only available for special vending machines) 4 - Exit the program

    • displayInvalidChoice

      public void displayInvalidChoice()
      Displays a message to inform the user that they have entered an invalid choice.

    • displayVendingFeaturesMenu

      public int displayVendingFeaturesMenu()
      Displays the vending features menu to the user and waits for their choice.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the user's menu choice. 1 - Display products 2 - Purchase a product 3 - Exit the menu

    • displayMaintenanceFeaturesMenu

      public int displayMaintenanceFeaturesMenu(boolean isSpecialVendingMachine)
      Displays the maintenance features menu to the user and waits for their choice.
      Parameters:
      isSpecialVendingMachine - A boolean representing whether or not the vending machine is a special vending machine.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the user's menu choice. 1 - Restock products 2 - Set product price 3 - Replenish denominations 4 - Display transactions 5 - Restock ingredients 6 - Back

    • displayCustomProductFeaturesMenu

      public int displayCustomProductFeaturesMenu()
      Displays the custom product features menu to the user and waits for their choice.
      Returns:
      An integer representing the user's menu choice. 1 - Display ingredients 2 - Create a customized product 3 - Purchase an individual ingredient 4 - Back
